title: UK's Yotel in discussions to check into India
description: According to Hubert Viriot, the CEO of London-based hotel management chain Yotel, the company is currently engaged in advanced discussions and assessing opportunities to potentially finalize its first hotel project in India this year. Viriot mentioned that factors such as population density and the growth of both domestic and international travel make India a favorable market
